collectionMetadata.name: Reliefs and Allowances for Taxable Individuals, Annual
collectionMetadata.description:
Number of claimants and amount of relief (e.g. earned income relief, child relief) and tax set-offs (e.g. personal tax rebates, parenthood tax rebate) claimed by taxable individuals for Year of Assessment (YA)2004 to YA2023. Income is assessed on a preceding year basis. The period of income relevant to the YA is the year preceding the YA. 


* All figures are as at 31 March of the following year for each Year of Assessment (i.e. YA2023 figures are as at 31 March 2024).

datasetMetadata.name: Tax Set-offs For Taxable Individuals By Type of Tax Set-offs
Reliefs and Allowances For Taxable Individuals
datasetMetadata.description:
From Year of Assessment 2018, the total amount of personal income tax reliefs which an individual can be allowed is subject to an overall relief cap of S$80,000 per year.

There will be differences between the Net Tax Assessed (NTA) and the Tax Collection published on data.gov.sg. NTA is the net tax assessed to be payable or repayable by an entity after taking into account allowable tax credits, tax remission, tax rebates and tax deducted at source, for a specific tax period. This might be different from the amount of tax collected as the taxes could be collected or refunded across different Financial Years (FY) due to taxpayers paying their taxes via GIRO instalments or having their past years’ assessments reviewed.

datasetMetadata.description: From Year of Assessment 2018, the total amount of personal income tax reliefs which an individual can be allowed is subject to an overall relief cap of S$80,000 per year.
